data.name: API Specifications Conference 2020
data.description: A place for API practitioners to come together and discuss the evolution of API technology including cutting edge keynotes and sessions that chart the future of APIs, in-depth specification and standards discussions and an extensive tutorial track.

relatedRecords.name: AsyncAPI Online Conference
relatedRecords.description: It all started like a crazy idea. Since we’re all confined at home due to the coronavirus pandemic, why not organizing a fully-remote online conference to meet each other and have some fun? We asked the community and the response was overwhelmingly positive. We had no choice! Time for some action!

relatedRecords.name: Jakarta One Brazil
relatedRecords.description:
About the Event This virtual event is a mix of expert talks, demos, and thought-provoking sessions focused on enterprise applications implemented using open source vendor-neutral Jakarta EE (successor of Java EE) and Eclipse MicroProfile specifications on Kubernetes.
